I am getting the same error as guy686 (Error reading file G:GameFiles__DISC__). Antivirus doesn't seem to have anything to do with it as I tried even completely uninstalling my antivirus and still got the error.

@marvinsuggs & guy686

It took me a while to figure this shit out, I think it might help you (I had the same problem with the installation and that method worked for me, s'all I can say) :

- Right Click on My Computer and choose properties from the drop down menu
- Click on the tab that says device manager
- Click on the + to the left of CDROM in the list of devices
- Double click on the virtual CDrom drive under there
- Click on the Settings tab
- Uncheck DMA if it is already checked (if you have this option available)
- Click "ok" and restart your computer
- Install your game
- ???
- Profit

http://gameinfocenter.com/pc-games/system-requirements/LEGO-Batman-2-DC-Super-Heroes.html

Minimum system requirements

OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista or Windows 7
CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 3800+ - 2 * 2000 Mhz
Memory: 1GB RAM
Graphics Card: NVIDIA 7600, 7800, 8xxx or better, ATI 1950 or better
Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible Audio Device
Hard disk space: Installation requires 10GB of free hard disk space.
Microsoft DirectX 9.0c (March 2009) is installed together with the game unless this or a more up to date version is already installed.

I play this in 1920x1200 with everything on max using my trusty old GTX9800 ;D.

Windows XP SP3 32-bit as I said, and I have Deamon Tools Pro Advanced 4.41 for mounting. The Pro Advanced has some extra tricks to make games install smoothly, like virtual IDE drive etc. Pehaps try this version if you have not got it already? :-)  Just remember to install as administrator.

It is (should be) a standard routine to always have latest version of: 
A: Display Drivers
B: Directx
C: Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 SP1
D: Microsoft Visual C++ 2008 SP1
E: Microsoft Visual C++ 2010 SP1

All games run on my machine with the above. Except for 64-bit only games :P  :P

Good Luck!
